description: Developed 5+ applications within the allotted time by deploying C, C++, JavaScript, etc. to write reusable programs
Integrated Google login feature for the Greengaze Mobile app to increase ~25% app usage
Accelerated the app development process with the help of Android Studio to build quality applications for 100+ devices.
Created an online PDF library to enable users to download and read the hosted files as per requirement
Enhanced the application's UI design by 25% via HTML5, CSS3, etc. as per the latest trend in various platforms
Succeeded in acquiring 100+ registered users within the first months of employment
